thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 13 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Donlinks International Investment Swings To Preliminary Loss In 2017, Sees Q1 Loss Widening

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Donlinks International Investment Swings To Preliminary Loss In 2017, Sees Q1 Loss Widening

organizations.name: reuters) - donlinks international investment co ltd

text:
April 13 (Reuters) - Donlinks International Investment Co Ltd:
* SAYS PRELIM 2017 NET LOSS OF 2.5 BILLION YUAN ($398.22 million) VERSUS NET PROFIT OF 19.5 MILLION YUAN YEAR AGO
* SAYS IT EXPECTS Q1 NET LOSS TO WIDEN TO 6-8 MLN YUAN FROM 5.1 MLN YUAN YEAR AGO Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2qtr6np ; bit.ly/2EHvSC1 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2780 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
